subject: Re: Unicode proposal again.
msgSnippet: Peter asked this on the Unicode forum, and I responded: One question that needs to be addressed (and has since I asked this a year or so ago) is whether it an
messageBody:
Peter asked this on the Unicode forum, and I responded:

One question that needs to be addressed (and has since I asked this a year or so ago) is
whether it an be unified with Shavian.

Peter responded to me privately:

"Looking at it there are only a few glyphs with the same shape in Shavian and they have
totally different meanings so I don't think they can be unified."

This needs substantiation.

I love encoding. I'm a splitter, normally, not a lumper. But if I'm not convinced about
disunifying Quikscript from the Shavian it derives from, the UTC and WG2 certainly won't be.

This discussion begins, alas, just as I am about to go on a fortnight's holiday. My e-mail
access will be spotty from tomorrow until 14 June. But tonight (as I'm all packed but for my
computer) I'll look into this.
